thread.title: MotoGP champ Marquez breaks hand

author: AAP
title: MotoGP champ Marquez breaks hand
text:
MotoGP champ Marquez breaks hand Posted by AAP + on 30/09/2015 at 8:26 pm AFL GRAND FINAL OFFER! If your team leads at any break but loses, CASH BACK up to $100!* PLUS Sign up now for a $501 Bonus Bet! MotoGP champ Marquez breaks hand 
Reigning MotoGP World Champion Marc Marquez has undergone surgery in Barcelona to treat a fracture to the fifth metacarpal of his left hand. 
The Repsol Honda rider suffered the fracture on Tuesday whilst mountain bike training on the outskirts of Cervera. 
The surgery was successful and Marquez isn’t expected to miss any races and is expected to ride in the Japanese Grand Prix, which takes place in ten days time at Motegi. 
Marquez had screws and a titanium plate inserted into the bone and will begin his rehab within 48 hours.
